entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
